name: ide-theme-rant
description: Light-hearted rant about IDE themes before finals week.

events.content: Finals week tradition: switch IDE themes to anything neon to stay awake. Who's with me?
My retinas say no. One dark theme to rule them all.
I ship my dotfiles to remind myself not to change themes until after deadlines ðŸ˜‚.
As long as git diff doesnâ€™t show theme changes, do whatever keeps you coding.
